Player History
Had 2000th career hit on 5/17/1965, off Diego Segui (KC1)...
Drafted in 3rd round, 46th overall pick, by California in 1967...
Injured on 5/3/1967 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/1/1970...
Injured on 4/7/1975 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1975, winning 2 games with a 2.57 ERA...
Injured on 7/7/1979 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Detroit in 1985...
Injured on 9/6/1986 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1987 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1989, off John Smoltz (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/1989, off Tom Candiotti (BAL)...
Injured on 5/11/1991 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (A) on 8/12/1991...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 9/1/1992...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
